title: Isfahan
summary: Isfahan (Persian: اصفهان‎, romanized: Esfahān [esfæˈhɒːn] (listen)), from its ancient designation Aspadana and later Spahan in middle Persian, rendered in English as Ispahan, is a major city in Greater Isfahan Region, Isfahan Province, Iran. It is located 406 kilometres (252 miles) south of Tehran and it is the capital of Isfahan Province. Isfahan has a population of approximately 1.5 million,[5] making it the third-largest city in Iran, after Mashhad and Tehran, and the second-largest metropolitan area.[6]
